    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_354249</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Lumière et photosynthèse</string>
            <string language="en">Light and Photosynthesis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht und Fotosynthese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz e fotossíntese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce e fotosintesi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φως και φωτοσύνθεση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Luz y fotosíntesis</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Photosynthèse : Lumière et photosynthèse.  Animation interactive, montrant comment le taux d'oxygène produit par la photosynthèse change quand le niveau de lumière augmente.</string>
            <string language="en">Photosynthesis: Light and photosynthesis. Interactive animation, showing how the rate of oxygen produced by photosynthesis changes as light level increases.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">photosynthèse</string>
            <string language="en">photosynthesis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">oxygène</string>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">usines</string>
            <string language="en">plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fotosynthese: Licht und Fotosynthese. 
Interaktive Animation, zeigend, wie die Kinetik des Sauerstoffes
produziert durch Fotosynthese wie helle waagerecht ausgerichtete 
Zunahmen ändert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fotossíntese: Luz e fotossíntese. 
Animation interativo, mostrando como a taxa do oxigênio 
produzida pela fotossíntese muda como aumentos nivelados claros.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fotosintesi: Luce e fotosintesi. 
Animazione interattiva, mostrante come il tasso di ossigeno 
prodotto dalla fotosintesi cambia come aumenti livellati chiari.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φωτοσύνθεση: Φως και φωτοσύνθεση. Η 
διαλογική ζωτικότητα, που επιδεικνύει πώς το ποσοστό οξυγόνου 
που παράγεται από τη φωτοσύνθεση αλλάζει ως ελαφρύ επίπεδο 
αυξάνεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fotosíntesis: Luz y fotosíntesis. 
Animación interactiva, mostrando cómo el índice del oxígeno 
producido por la fotosíntesis cambia como los aumentos llanos 
ligeros.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fotosynthese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sauerstoff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebe</string>
          </keyword>
